title._content: Image taken from page 287 of 'The Sportsman's Paradise; or, the Lake Lands of Canada ... With illustrations by D. C. and H. Beard. Second edition'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The Sportsman's Paradise; or, the Lake Lands of Canada ... With illustrations by D. C. and H. Beard. Second edition" Author: WATSON, B. A. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10470.h.18." Page: 287 Place of Publishing: Philadelphia Date of Publishing: 1888 Publisher: J. B. Lippincott Co. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 003863326 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
